item.title: Debbie Allen Talks ‘A Different World’ Reboot, Representation and Global Diversity
item.description: Trailblazing director, dancer, actor and producer Debbie Allen headed to Martha’s Vineyard for the first time in her life for the 23rd annual Martha’s Vineyard African American Film Festiv
